sentences.sContent: The human brain is an incredibly complicated organ.
sentences.sCn: 人脑是一个结构极其复杂的器官。

sentences.sContent: ...complicated systems on which much public safety depends...
...knowledge has become so growingly complicated that if we don't put it into practice...
...The full details are complicated - the text alone runs to 385 pages– and trying tosummarise it is no easy task...
...or is the world a more complicated and dangerous place than it was when previous generations were allowed to wander about unsupervised...
...but those with the more complicated task showed even worse reaction times—an average of 480 milliseconds extra delay...

remMethod.val: com(共同) ＋ plic(重叠) ＋ ated → 重叠在一起的 → 复杂的

words.tran: 并发症；复杂；复杂化；混乱
使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入

trans.tranOther: consisting of many closely connected parts
